title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: Yes thats you read it right fom the title. Few hours ago a project Ive been scouting has announced their public testnet on June 20th. This is an L1 project related with Injective Protocol. Im sharing this for those who wants to be early for some task or follow a project. Lately some are late to notice a potential drop like arbitrum, sui and many more.Here is the official announcement: https://medium.com/burnt/announcing-the-xion-public-testnet-early-access-launch-caae0bfe4dd PS: Read on details on their medium post, everything is there. Just follow and participate if you feel its worth your time if not then its cool. Just sharing to our crypto enthusiast and fond of retroairdrops.
